name: mikroe.click.current11
short_description: Current 11 Click is a compact add-on board for industrial and commercial current-sensing applications. This board features the ACS37600K (ACS37600KOKATN-006B5-C), a programmable linear Hall-effect sensor IC from Allegro Microsystems. This sensor features a chopper-stabilized Hall-effect front-end for precise magnetic flux detection, with a sensitivity of 6mV/G and a bidirectional operating range of Â±333G.
